about.description:
I'm a passionate Java Developer, currently pursuing my B.S. in Computer Science, and I also hold a degree in Business Administration. I don't just write code; I build solutions that drive business value. This unique combination allows me to understand core business operations and strategic goals, letting me bridge the critical gap between technical teams and business stakeholders.

I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's in Computer Science to build a deep theoretical foundation, while simultaneously honing my practical skills in full-stack development. I combine robust back-end logic in
>Java (Spring Boot) with modern front-end technologies like

>JavaScript.

I'm a natural problem-solver, a collaborative team player, and I'm always eager to learn. I'm looking for an opportunity to contribute to challenging projects where I can leverage both my technical and business-acumen.
